pkgmetadata.longdescription: R API to MET Norway's 'Frost' API // An R API to MET Norway's 'Frost' API https://frost.met.no/index.html to retrieve data as data frames. The 'Frost' API, and the underlying data, is made available by the Norwegian Meteorological Institute (MET Norway). The data and products are distributed under the Norwegian License for Open Data 2.0 (NLOD) https://data.norge.no/nlod/en/2.0 and Creative Commons 4.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/.
